title: Four arrested with smuggled spices, medicine and cosmetic products in Kilinochchi
byline: A total of four persons have been apprehended with a stock of smuggled spices, medicine and cosmetic products during a search operation conducted in the beach of Devils Point, Kilinochchi by the Sri Lanka Navy.

title: Sri Lanka’s workers’ remittances exceed USD 600 mn in June
byline: Sri Lanka has received USD 635.7 million in workers’ remittances in June 2025, according to the latest figures released by the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL).

title: Showers expected in several places today
byline: Showers will occur at times in the Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in the Nuwara-Eliya, Kandy, Galle and Matara districts today (13), the Department of Meteorology said.

title: Dozens of British MPs call for UK to recognise Palestine as state
byline: Nearly 60 British MPs have called on David Lammy and the Foreign Office to immediately recognise Palestine as a state.
